
šum₂-mu {1}KI.MIN ina a-de-e an-nu-ti ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur ih-ti-ṭi {1}KI.MIN lu {MI₂}ha-rim-tu₂ {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-šu₂ lu MI₂-MEŠ GIM {MI₂}ha-rim-tu₂ ina re-bit URU-šu₂-nu nid-nu lim-hu-ru KUR ana KUR lid-hu-šu₂-nu TI ša {1}KI.MIN lu ša₂ {ANŠE}GIR₃.NUN aš₂-ša₂-tu-šu₂ li-tu-tu {d}15 be-lit NITA-MEŠ GAŠAN MI₂-MEŠ {GIŠ}BAN-su-nu li-kim x+x bal-tu-šu₂-nu liš-kun lim-ru-ur bi-kit-su-nu ma-a a-hu-la ma-a ina a-de-e ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur ni-ih-ti-ṭi šum₂-mu {1}KI.MIN ina a-de-e an-nu-ti ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur ih-ti-ṭi 

x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x a x x x x x x x x x x x x ina IGI MAN-MEŠ-ni mi-x x x x x x x x x sar-ti DINGIR-MEŠ x+x x x x x x x x x x x a-ha-iš x+x x x x x x x x x x x x 

šum₂-mu {1}KI.MIN ina a-de-e x x x x x x x x KA₂-šu₂ li-pi-hi-ma ku-x+x x x x x x x x x x hab-ba-ti KA₂ ša UN-MEŠ-šu₂ x x x x x x li-ni-la mu-x+x x x x x x x x x x BURU₅{MUŠEN} lit-ba-am-ma KUR-su KU₂ x x x x+x-ma IGI.2-šu₂-nu lu-na-pi-il URU ša₂ 01-lim E₂-MEŠ a-na 01 E₂ li-tur o 01-lim {TUG₂}maš-ku-nu a-na 01 {TUG₂}maš-ki-ni li-tur ina ŠA₃ URU 01 LU₂ a-na di-li-li li-ni-zib
